actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of June 24, 1938, to allow the Secretary of the Interior to invest certain funds collected by Indian irrigation and power projects.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) invest collections from specified Indian irrigation and power projects in certain Federal obligations; and (2) use the earnings from such investments to reduce the maintenance charges on the projects from which the funds were originally collected.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of June 24, 1938, to allow the Secretary of the Interior to invest certain funds collected by Indian irrigation and power projects.
